messages.subject: circumcision/vaccination
messages.msgSnippet: circumcision was never an option for us. i did do the research, i think mainly to tell other people with complete confidence why we weren t going to cut the
messages.messageBody:
circumcision was never an option for us. i did do the research, i think
mainly to tell other people with complete confidence why we weren't going to
cut the tip of our son's penis off.

on the vaccination issue, i'd like to say that most people i know who don't
get these shots don't just not get vaccinations and hope they never get
diseases. they're generally educated about health, natural foods, exercise,
etc. and some use homeopathic routes, some parents use daily swedish massage
as a natural immune booster.

and yes, this all began as a subject of choice. most people don't know they
even have one.

brenda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
